amendment.description: Amendment allocates an additional $3 million for post-disaster watershed assessment studies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase the amount made available for "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Investigations" account by $3,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A057) Agreed to by voice vote.
